title: Voice Command Health Data Retrieval – Alerts and Notifications for Health Anomalies
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to use voice commands to access and monitor my patients' health data, so that I can efficiently track their vitals and receive alerts for any health anomalies without interrupting my patient care routines.

title: Contextual Caregiver Alerts – Voice Alerts for Critical Health Changes
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive voice alerts for critical health changes in my patients so that I can monitor their health status efficiently and respond promptly to any anomalies, even while traveling between visits.

title: Interactive Care Task Management – Real-Time Status Updates
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive real-time updates on my patients' health metrics so that I can monitor their conditions efficiently and respond promptly to any changes.

title: Personalized Communication Settings – Voice-Activated Preferences for Caregivers
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to set personalized voice-activated preferences for communication with my patients so that I can efficiently manage health updates and medication reminders without interrupting my care routines.

title: Health Insight Dialogue System – Conversational Updates on Health Trends
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive conversational updates on my patients' health trends so that I can track their health progression over time and identify early warning signs efficiently.

title: Direct Voice Messaging for Care Coordination
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to send and receive quick voice messages to coordinate care with my patients and their families efficiently, so that I can maintain communication without interrupting my patient visits.

title: Voice Summaries of Recent Health Data
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to provide voice summaries of my patients' recent health data, so that I can quickly assess their health status and make informed care decisions during my visits.
